title: 340 S Loomis St. 3 Bedroom and 3 bathroom House 5 min from DT Nape
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   3 Bedroom and 3 Bathroom with full additional office/potential 4th bedroom available. Across the street from North Central College and only a few blocks to downtown Naperville. Nothing like this available. Perfect for someone building in the area that wants to enjoy the schools starting this fall or 3-4 NCC students looking for a gem. Available 8/1  $3600 a month.  Text me(Tom) at 847-three-four-four-6664 or email me if interested.
